name: Tea Party Terror (Demo)
description:
IIIF

When Casey is asked to help clean the attic, she reminisces about her childhood toys, but one toy, a doll named Charlotte, is not content with being left to gather dust.  Casey must play along with Charlotte's whims to subdue her, and she does not want to know the consequences otherwise.

Some written descriptions of horror themes, no graphical depictions currently.  Those with aversions to creepy dolls will probably not enjoy this.

Demo developed for the Fluffy Horror Game Jam

Play time: ~20 minutes
Complete Endings: 3 (More routes in development)

Note: This is both my first visual novel and game jam entry.  I have to put a hold on it due to technical issues but would like to continue working on it (longer/finished routes, more detailed art, stronger horror themes, etc.).  With this in mind, feedback is  welcome.
